attributes.action: Make regulations of irresponsible cyclists harsher
attributes.background: It doesn't take long to notice masses of negligent cyclists ignoring the rules of the road, especially when your life is put at risk. We aren't the only ones left fuming at carefree cyclists passing red lights. Harsher regulations must be enforced on cyclists, especially around school areas.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We can only accept petitions from named individuals, not organisations.
